statements: DELETE FROM predictive_modeling_features WHERE id = 1 AND feature_name = 'Age';
DELETE FROM predictive_modeling_features WHERE aggregation_function = 'SUM' AND data_type = 'Numeric';
DELETE FROM SummarizedData WHERE summary_type = 'average' AND summary_value <= 100
DELETE FROM feature_summary WHERE feature_name = 'Example Feature 1';
DELETE FROM model_features WHERE feature_id = 3 AND model_id = 5;
DELETE FROM aggregate_data WHERE value < 100 AND date <= '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM summary_data WHERE total_count > 100 AND date < '2022-01-01'
